com.swagfish.tictactoe

Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swagfish.tictactoe.TicTacToe

  • public class TicTacToe
extends java.lang.Object

    TicTacToe

    The TicTacToe class implements a video game that two players can play at a time. The API can be integrated and used for any platform.
    Since:
    2016-10-20

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToe()
      The default constructor does not approve of no value being passed in, therefore throwing an exception and generating the default map (of size 3)
      TicTacToe(int size)
      The constructor initializes the map for TicTacToe.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToe

        public TicTacToe()
          throws InvalidTicTacToeSizeException
        The default constructor does not approve of no value being passed in, therefore throwing an exception and generating the default map (of size 3)
        Throws:
        InvalidTicTacToeSizeException - You should initialize with a value

      • TicTacToe

        public TicTacToe(int size)
          throws InvalidTicTacToeSizeException
        The constructor initializes the map for TicTacToe. Accepted values are between 3 and 10.
        Parameters:
        size - This is the only parameter and sets the map size
        Throws:
        InvalidTicTacToeSizeException - Invalid size of map
